static gboolean keybinds_callback ( GtkWindow *  window,
GdkEvent *  event 
) [static]
Parameters:
windowThe toplevel window on which we get the signal.
eventThe keyboard event.
Returns:
TRUE if the event was handled.

Get pressed key, add it to a buffer. When the buffer match to a registered command, execute the lua callback.
